name: Aspect (itch) (LlamaDev Games)
description:
Aspect is a roguelike dungeon crawler project in development, with a whole variety of planned features, lore, weapons, enemies, and spells planned. The player can travel down into the depths of a dungeon, armed at first with only a steel sword and bow, and find new treasure, to fight new enemies, and discover what lies in the depths of the dungeon.

Aspect is currently in EARLY ACCESS. Any features are NOT final and may change before the final release. If you find any bugs in the game, please join the discord and report them to us, or report them in the project comments.

Controls
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Left Click to Use Weapon
  • Number keys / scroll wheel to Switch slot
  • E to Open Inventory
  • Return to Go down ladder
  • Esc to Pause

You can watch the Devlogs on Youtube here. 

You can also join the community discord here.
